name: Skydive Sniper
description:
RMB - aim. LMB - Shoot

This is an entry into the Game in Six #2 game jam. The theme of the jam was "On-rails/Lightgun shooter"

You are an assassin ejected from a plane over a city, with the aim of assassinating your targets from above. Click start and follow the voiceover prompts to find and eliminate your target.

The game is incomplete, so ALT-F4 and reload the game to play a second time. Work in progress!

Game creation was streamed live on twitch.tv/budpico

This game uses free sound effects from sonniss GDC sound effects giveaways.

It uses the free city model from Geopipe.
